trans-unit.source: Sets the VISA timeout in MILISECONDS

seg-source.mrk: Sets the VISA timeout in MILISECONDS

target.mrk: Sets the VISA timeout in MILISECONDS

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: A VISA descriptor (STRING) OR a VISA session handle (INTEGER).

seg-source.mrk: A VISA descriptor (STRING) OR a VISA session handle (INTEGER).

target.mrk: A VISA descriptor (STRING) OR a VISA session handle (INTEGER).

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks of the _viExecCommand() for more info.

seg-source.mrk: See the Remarks of the _viExecCommand() for more info.

target.mrk: See the Remarks of the _viExecCommand() for more info.

trans-unit.source: The timeout IN MILISECONDS for VISA operations (mainly for GPIB queries)

seg-source.mrk: The timeout IN MILISECONDS for VISA operations (mainly for GPIB queries)

target.mrk: The timeout IN MILISECONDS for VISA operations (mainly for GPIB queries)

trans-unit.source: If you set it to 0 the tiemouts are DISABLED.

seg-source.mrk: If you set it to 0 the tiemouts are DISABLED.

target.mrk: If you set it to 0 the tiemouts are DISABLED.

trans-unit.source: If you set it to "INF" the VISA operations will NEVER timeout.

seg-source.mrk: If you set it to "INF" the VISA operations will NEVER timeout.

target.mrk: If you set it to "INF" the VISA operations will NEVER timeout.

trans-unit.source: Be careful with this as it could easly hung your program ifv your instrument does not respond to one of your queries.

seg-source.mrk: Be careful with this as it could easly hung your program ifv your instrument does not respond to one of your queries.

target.mrk: Be careful with this as it could easly hung your program ifv your instrument does not respond to one of your queries.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the bus type (GPIB, TCP, etc) the timeout might not be set to the exact value that you request. Instead the closest valid timeout bigger than the one that you requested will be used.

seg-source.mrk: Depending on the bus type (GPIB, TCP, etc) the timeout might not be set to the exact value that you request.
Instead the closest valid timeout bigger than the one that you requested will be used.

target.mrk: Depending on the bus type (GPIB, TCP, etc) the timeout might not be set to the exact value that you request.
Instead the closest valid timeout bigger than the one that you requested will be used.

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: -1 and sets the @error flag to non-zero if the VISA DLL could not be open

seg-source.mrk: -1 and sets the @error flag to non-zero if the VISA DLL could not be open

target.mrk: -1 and sets the @error flag to non-zero if the VISA DLL could not be open

trans-unit.source: or a NON ZERO value representing the VISA error code (see the VISA programmer's guide).

seg-source.mrk: or a NON ZERO value representing the VISA error code (see the VISA programmer's guide).

target.mrk: or a NON ZERO value representing the VISA error code (see the VISA programmer's guide).

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: Most of the time it is not necessary to call this function, as _viExecCommand() has a third OPTIONAL parameter $iTimeoutMS which can also be used to set the VISA timeout.

seg-source.mrk: Most of the time it is not necessary to call this function, as _viExecCommand() has a third OPTIONAL parameter $iTimeoutMS which can also be used to set the VISA timeout.

target.mrk: Most of the time it is not necessary to call this function, as _viExecCommand() has a third OPTIONAL parameter $iTimeoutMS which can also be used to set the VISA timeout.

trans-unit.source: As for all the VISA functions the VISA libraries must be installed (you can check whether visa32.dll is in {WINDOWS}\system32) and a GPIB card (such as a National Instruments NI PCI-GPIB card or an Agilent 82350B PCI High-Performance GPIB card) must be installed

seg-source.mrk: As for all the VISA functions the VISA libraries must be installed (you can check whether visa32.dll is in {WINDOWS}\system32) and a GPIB card (such as a National Instruments NI PCI-GPIB card or an Agilent 82350B PCI High-Performance GPIB card) must be installed

target.mrk: As for all the VISA functions the VISA libraries must be installed (you can check whether visa32.dll is in {WINDOWS}\system32) and a GPIB card (such as a National Instruments NI PCI-GPIB card or an Agilent 82350B PCI High-Performance GPIB card) must be installed

trans-unit.source: * For a detailed description of the most common VISA DESCRIPTORS look at the Remarks of the help on the _viExecCommand() function
